334390.name: Our Darker Purpose - Soundtrack
334390.description:
Our Darker Purpose - The Official Soundtrack
by Nate Fenwick Smith

NOTE: Soundtrack does not include Sad Piano by Alex G (can be downloaded free here:

1. Welcome to Edgewood 02:08
2. Through the Gates 02:49
3. To Die Alone 00:12
4. Behind the Red Door 02:52
5. Victory! For Now... 00:47
6. Within the Bully - The Woundworts' Theme 04:23
7. Detention Enforced 02:59
8. Enticements of the Dark Magic - The Capulets' Theme 03:57
9. Juice Boxes Required 02:20
10. Gifted Students 04:29
11. Madness Unleashed 02:56
12. Time With Your Caring Friends 04:09
13. His Nefarious Intent 02:49
14. Our Darker Purpose 02:55
15. A Vigilant Mind Endures All 02:06
16. BONUS TRACK: Fallen Gates 03:05
